title: Where can I get a free US phone number? - Quora

response.answer_text: Best you can do is sign up for free trials on some of the sites that provide virtual phone numbers, as almost none offer them free of charge permanently. Your best bet would be Google Voice… IF it was available, well anywhere outside the US. Last I’ve checked, it was available only there and you could use it only if you had a US number for verification purposes, and I somehow doubt you’d be asking for a US phone number if you already had one. That said, there are many cheap providers out there that won’t charge too much per month. I use Freeje, personally. They’re cheap, provide a great service and know how to please their customers.
